resources.string: You need two or more images!

Introduction
Panorama application The application can modify pictures and make pictures horizontal or verticalThe app can cut photos.
Age compatibility of the application
The app is suitable for ages 13 and up.
Permissions
We require the user to access the Internet and also reading from the storage memory to get the photos, the highest modification.
Data collection and analysis purposes
You only get the images to edit, we do not store the images on servers or anything else.
Sharing data with third parties....?
No, we do not share or store any data
By using this app, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
